scripts.build:solidato: CURRENT_DAO=solidato pnpm codegen && pnpm generate:contracts-addresses:solidato && graph build
scripts.deploy-production:solidato: NETWORK=optimism pnpm build:solidato && graph deploy --studio solidato --network-file networks/solidato.json --network optimism
scripts.deploy-staging:solidato: NETWORK=optimism-sepolia pnpm build:solidato && graph deploy --studio solidato-test --network-file networks/solidato.json --network optimism-sepolia
